entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
